SureStike:
Responds on the Come link. "We are under Fire right now but we found the two missing, Was it a clone of one of us that got him? We are fighting Clones right now. The Relay is setup so send a message back to base about what is going on. We will be catching up to you shortley." as SureStrike and the others begin to fall back with the injured taking heavy blow as the move.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:


Windlord opened his comlink to Sure Strike and said "SureTRike, 
COOLEY IS WOUNDED i HAVE TO TAKE HIM TO BASE BEFORE HIS SPARK 
GONE...!!"

After that he took him in arms and flew towards Maximal Base

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Cooley Looked toward WinLord and his eyes seemed Bloodshot. "I 
have felt better." As he turned to WinLord the damage was highly 
Visable. His Bio Matrics were shot. His spark seems to be showing a 
little bit and he is losing alot of a reddish substance. His eyes 
however don't look Robotic though they look almost Human.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> Windlord ran and started to check his friend "COoley... Are you 
all
